body:
Hello, fellow forum user!

I hope no one thinks this is very spammy, but I recently discovered how convenient it is to use Google Chrome shortcuts. For the longest time, I've done things the harder way, and I wish I found out about these sooner. Of course, this is no big deal as it's just to give you some more ease while operating Google. Hope someone finds this useful x3

https://support.google.com/chrome/answer/157179?hl=en

title: For users of Google Chrome

replies.body: I know and use a lot of these. Really helpful for impressing computer noobs and improving workflow.
